briefdescription.para: Defines the minus operator for computing set difference of set A and set B.

the set of items to be removed

simplesect.para: a set with items of set b removed

briefdescription.para: Defines the plus operator for computing union of set A and set B.

simplesect.para: a set with the union of set a and set b

briefdescription.para: Defines the intersection operator for computing set intersection of two sets.

simplesect.para: intersection of set a and set b
